name: Hotel Transylvania: Monsters
description:
Join Drac, Mavis, and the whole monster gang in this brand new game for HOTEL TRANSYLVANIA fans!

COLLECT all your favorite monsters from the franchise including Frank, Wayne, Murray, and Blobby.

UPGRADE your monsters with Monster Mojo potions, Terror Tomes, and Relics to make them stronger.

EXPLORE tons of content including hundreds of challenges, Daily Activities, and special Limited Time Events.

COMPETE with other players in PVP tournaments to climb the Leaderboard and win fantastic prizes.

JOIN or create a Guild and take on creepy challenges with other players.


THE STORY:
Through the ages there has always been a playful competition between Drac and the gang and now there is an opportunity for each monster to officially prove who is the most fearsome, scary creature in the land. Every 100 years, when the Blood Moon rises, tournaments are held in mythical locations around the globe for fantastic prizes. Monsters will compete to show they are the strongest. Monsters will compete to show they are the scariest. Monsters will compete to win the Blood Moon Festival!


FEATURES:

CASUAL, STRATEGIC GAMEPLAY
Endlessly challenging, enjoyable puzzle levels where players mix gem breaking with special Abilities.

TONS OF SINGLE-PLAYER CONTENT
Explore the world of Hotel Transylvania featuring hundreds of unique challenges against dozens of different monsters.

DAILY ACTIVITIES
The hotel's itinerary adds to the fun and adventure as you work to complete objectives for your hotel.

VERSUS BATTLES
Take your strongest monsters into matches against the best teams of other players.

COLLECTION & CUSTOMIZATION
Over 50 unique monsters can be collected and upgraded in many different ways. Combine them into teams to compete against other monsters.

MULTIPLAYER & CO-OP
Compete alone or join a Guild in ranked, multiplayer leagues.
